results.content: good coverage of Adonis features as part of the process of building a specific application.  one improvement would be to include a few minutes of design choices: 30 seconds of listing the possible ways to solve this problem, 30 seconds of tradeoffs, 30 seconds explaining the choice that's being made and then back to the video.  otherwise enjoying it, about half way through
results.content_html: good coverage of Adonis features as part of the process of building a specific application. one improvement would be to include a few minutes of design choices: 30 seconds of listing the possible ways to solve this problem, 30 seconds of tradeoffs, 30 seconds explaining the choice that's being made and then back to the video. otherwise enjoying it, about half way through

results.content:
The course is really good. The instructor gives a really good introduction to the AdonisJS framework and also gets into mid-level complexity features such as sending emails to reset passwords, creating custom middlewares, and setting up Nginx with digital ocean.

I see some reviews here complaining about the instructor's accent. These people don't how to embrace the internet yet. That is what is about, you get access to knowledge from people all over the world and of course, the accent will change. Turn on the caption or rewind the video to better understand.

Great course overall!!!!
